vmassol - (17/07/2009 11:46): rrodriguez: hi  
vmassol - (17/07/2009 11:46): I don't understand why you've linked to wikipedia on http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Modules/RenderingModule :)  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:46): vmassol: hi  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:46): :-(  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:47): just trying to link some documentation to the concepts render and parser  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:50): It could be possible to find a best option! But it helped me to understand the input-output flow   
vmassol - (17/07/2009 11:53): rrodriguez: I still don't understand the links  
vmassol - (17/07/2009 11:53): what does it have to do with programming languages on wikipedia?  
vmassol - (17/07/2009 11:54): the link to Render doesn't really help IMO too... actually it probably confuses things ;)  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:56): I will try to find a best option  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:56): I agree with you about Render, but   
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:58): why the link parser is not a reasonable option?  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 11:58): a parser...which checks for correct syntax and builds a data structure  
rrodriguez - (17/07/2009 12:04): I will back in some thirty minutes!
